ygData.subject: Big update to the tinkering site
ygData.msgSnippet: The contents of the Journal of Gimblestan XI has been put up on the website, included in it is the plans to make the fireworks and the collapsible fishing
ygData.messageBody:
The contents of the Journal of Gimblestan XI has been put up on the
website, included in it is the plans to make the fireworks and the
collapsible fishing pole.

I was e-mailed this information last night directly from the person who
found the book. One point I want to make clear - he is anonymous and wants
to remain so to avoid getting swarmed by people asking how/where he got the
book. So if you think you know who he is, don't ask.

BTW Rotgut you can take down the database :) Anyone who was trying to
figure out the fishing pole formula, you're going to be kicking yourself
when you see how #%$^ close we were. LOL

-Luke
Tinkering guide website:
http://www.eqportal.com/tinkering
